**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Cocoon Of Lucid Potential](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2072) **Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 17 **Perception** +26 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +30, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30 **Str** +5 **Dex** +1 **Con** +5 **Int** +1 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +8 **Anchored in Silk** The cocoon is incapable of movement beyond slight wriggling in place. It has no Speed and can't move or [be moved](/Rules.aspx?ID=451), even through means such as [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156), as the Weaver's threads tether it in place physically and astrally. The cocoon casts any spells psychically, substituting verbal and somatic components for expressions of pure unbridled will and removing the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait from its Cast a Spell action. --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +26 **Ref** +20 **Will** +29 **HP** 290 **Weaknesses** in there somewhere **In There Somewhere** Killia's individuality still rests within the cocoon, yet trying to resist assimilation. If a PC succeeds at a DC 32 [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check on the cocoon, the cocoon takes 5d6 mental damage and is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) as Killia's consciousness fights the Weaver. The cocoon can't be affected in this way more than once per turn.
**Give of Oneself** **Trigger** The Weaver would be reduced to 0 Hit Points; Effect The cocoon's vitality is linked to the Weaver's. It loses 30 Hit Points, restoring 15 Hit Points to the Weaver. It can use this ability even if it would otherwise be unable to act. --- **Speed** 0 feet **Ranged** psychic scream +27 ([Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)), **Damage** 4d6 sonic plus 4d6 mental **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 33, attack +27 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Phase Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=1159), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **5th** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Etheric Shards](/Spells.aspx?ID=1152), [Sea of Thought](/Spells.aspx?ID=1162), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327) (4 slots) - **6th** [Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (4 slots) - **7th** [Invisibility Curtain](/Spells.aspx?ID=936), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Telekinetic Bombardment](/Spells.aspx?ID=1165) (3 slots) **Of Same Essence** The cocoon and the Weaver share the same essence. Its spells never affect the Weaver if they would harm him, and the Weaver can ignore the any of the cocoon's active spell effects if he desires (such as [_sea of thought_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1162)).
name: Cocoon Of Lucid Potential
